personalProjects.title: Dogs' Spring
personalProjects.description: Angular project based on a web app for pet grooming which show all services offered by the shop. It's implemented the possibility to signup/signin with Firebase Authentication and booking appointments synchronized with Google Calendar, but never showed.

professionalProjects.title: EniPlenitude
professionalProjects.description: Customer application to manage energy, gas and fiber supply contracts, bills, and services. Developed using Vue.js and jQuery, integrated with Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) for content management.
